thread.title: Canadian researchers set to study cannabis oil - BBC News
thread.title_full: Canadian researchers set to study cannabis oil - BBC News

title: Canadian researchers set to study cannabis oil - BBC News
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Canadian researchers set to study cannabis oil 23 February 2017 Last updated at 02:23 GMT 
Liam has Dravet syndrome, a severe form of epilepsy. But after debilitating seizures and pharmaceutical trials and errors throughout his life, Liam's parents turned to cannabis oil. 
Now a Canadian hospital in Toronto will be studying the effects cannabis oil in a new study - as many doctors are worried about prescribing it without scientific data on dosage and potential side effects. 
Video by Dan Lytwyn
